name: ts-chrome-extension-boilerplate
description: A boilerplate for Chrome Extensions written in TypeScript

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:ts && yarn build:scss && yarn copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: cp -R static/* extension/ && cp -R src/* extension/ && find extension -type f \( -iname '*.ts' -o -iname '*.scss' \) -delete

author: Sadegh Nobari
